messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group of 21 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, and Reza. Sara is connected to Pari, Pam, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Zack is connected to Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia, Ming, and Prem. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Moin is connected to Puja, Pari, Kim, and Ian. Ming is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, Amy, and Gia. Wei is connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva. Kim is connected to Ian, Puja, and Pari. Ian is connected to Puja and Pari. Gia is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, and Amy. Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing. Puja is connected to scholars Pari. Prem is connected to Matt, Eva, and Amy. Wim is connected to Jing. Pari is connected to Amy. Amy is connected to Matt. Matt is connected to Eva. From Wim what is the shortest path to Matt? Starting from Wim, please list the scholar names in order, including Wim, separated by commas.

First, I will identify the scholars Wim is directly connected to. From the information given, Wim is connected to Amir, Nisha, Raj, Reza, and Jing. 

Next, I'll check which of these scholars are connected to Matt. None of the scholars directly connected to Wim are connected to Matt.

Therefore, I will have to go a step further. I'll check the scholars that each scholar connected to Wim is connected to. 
Amir does not have any connections to Matt.
Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei but none of them is directly connected to Matt.
Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. None of them is directly connected to Matt.
Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing. None of them is directly connected to Matt.
Jing is connected to Amir, Wim, Nisha, Raj, Reza, and Pam. Among them, Pam is the only scholar who has a new connection which we haven't explored yet.

Therefore, I'll explore the connections of Pam next. Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. None of them is directly connected to Matt.

Therefore, I'll go a step further and check the connections of Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. 
Kim is connected to Ian, Puja, and Pari.
Ian is connected to Puja and Pari.
Moin is connected to Puja, Pari, Kim, and Ian.
Puja is connected to Pari.

Among all the new connections, Pari is directly connected to Amy.

Finally, I'll check Amy's connections. Amy is directly connected to Matt.

So, the shortest path from Wim to Matt is Wim - Jing - Pam - Kim - Pari - Amy - Matt.
 
Answer: Wim, Jing, Pam, Kim, Pari, Amy, Matt.

3stepPath.parsed_response: Answer: Wim, Jing, Pam, Kim, Pari, Amy, Matt
